# Stables Isotope Analysis for Lake Trout in a Multibasin Lake. 
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/674055860.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/674055860)

Code and data for manuscript focused on how the size and availability of thermal habitats drives differences in habitat use and thus affecting trophic niches, growth and conditon of Lake Trout.
